Togepi (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0174: Igglybuff
Pokémon
#0176: Togetic →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Togepi (TCG Pocket).

Togepi has been featured on 19 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Togepi cards are normally Psychic-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Togepi

Togepi
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
